Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.medicalservice.AdminClerk.controllers.UserController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/user")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class handling user-related operations.

        @GetMapping(value="/allUsers")
public java.util.List<UserEO> fetchAllUsers()
        Fetches all users from the database.
        Returns:

      • updateUser

        @PutMapping(value="/updateUser/{email}")
public void updateUser(@PathVariable(value="email")
                                                                 java.lang.String email,
                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                 UserEO updatedUser)
        Updates a user's information by email.
        Parameters:
        email - The email of the user to be updated.
        updatedUser - The updated UserEO object.

      • deleteUser

        @DeleteMapping(value="/deleteUser/{email}")
public void deleteUser(@PathVariable(value="email")
                                                                    java.lang.String email)
        Deletes a user by email.
        Parameters:
        email - The email of the user to be deleted.

      • findUserByEmail

        @GetMapping(value="/userByEmail/{email}")
public UserEO findUserByEmail(@PathVariable(value="email")
                                                                         java.lang.String email)
        Finds a user by their email address.
        Parameters:
        email - The email address of the user to find.
        Returns:
        The UserEO object representing the found user.

      • fetchEmailsByRole

        @GetMapping(value="/emailsByRole/{roleName}")
public java.util.List<java.lang.String> fetchEmailsByRole(@PathVariable(value="roleName")
                                                                                                         java.lang.String roleName)
        Fetches email addresses of users with a specific role.
        Parameters:
        roleName - The role name to filter users by.
        Returns:
        A list of email addresses.

      • validateLogin

        @PostMapping(value="/login")
public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> validateLogin(@RequestBody
                                                                                         UserEO user)
        Validates user login credentials and generates a JWT token.
        Parameters:
        user - The UserEO object containing login credentials.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing role name and JWT token.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if user authentication fails.
